name: abss-technical-assessment
description: Invoice Management System - Laravel API + Angular Frontend

scripts.docker:setup: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up && npm run docker:wait && npm run docker:migrate
scripts.docker:wait: echo 'Waiting for services to start...' && sleep 10
scripts.docker:migrate: docker-compose exec app php artisan migrate --force
scripts.docker:seed: docker-compose exec app php artisan db:seed --force
scripts.docker:fresh: docker-compose exec app php artisan migrate:fresh --seed --force
scripts.docker:key: docker-compose exec app php artisan key:generate --force
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
